content:
Verify Now  - API Document  
Version  – 1.0 Introduction  
Mobile p hone numbers serve  as the ultimate user identity in the digital  universe. Digital applications,  
whether on the web  or on mobile verify the mobile numbers of their users to ensure their authenticity. 
To address this growing need, U2opia has developed a reliable, quick,  and cost -effective mobile number 
verification service called Verify Now  
Help and S upport  
For implementation support and any feedback, please reach out to  us at 
operations@messagecentral.com  
API Request and Response  
The API will only accept requests fro m the service provider via the API Endpoint URI shared with the 
service provider and from whitelisted IP addresses over HTTP, partner to provide a list of source IP.  
REST API Base URL’s:  
All Platform API endpoints below should be prefixed with the following URL:  
https://cpaas .messagecentral.com  
 
Generate  Token  
To generate Auth Token for send otp & valida te otp header.  For now, the Auth Token automatically 
expires in 30 minutes.  
 
Field  Type  Mandatory  Description  
customerId  String  yes Customer identifier  
country  Integer  no Country  
Email  String  no Email  
key String  yes Base -64 encrypted password  
scope  String  no Use ‘NEW’  
 
 
 
 
 
 
  
 
  4 | P a g e  
 
Request URL Path: Response JSON:  
 
A successful response will return a 200 status code . 
 
 
Below in an example success generate token : 
 
curl --location 
'https://cpaas.messagecentral.com/auth/v1/authentication/token?country=IN&customerId =C-
X6CXXB61FB71XXX&email=demo@messagecental.com&key=<BASE64_ Encoded_Password> &scope=NE
W' \ 
--header 'accept: */ *' 
 
  /auth /v1/ authentication/token  
           
{ 
    "status":  Integer , 
    "token":  "String " 
} 
{ 
    "status":  200,  
    "token":  "eyJhbGciOiJIUzUxMiJ9.eyJzdWIiOiJDLOTQ2RSIsMSwiZXhwIjoxNjkyMTgwNDAxfQ.I -
MsGOVDnRApFYNeLm4yErKxcW_PqMPweMH9a0y62xqO_b3cvZ96hLXp7UbQ"  
}  
 
  5 | P a g e  
 
Send O TP 
To send OTP  on a mobile number below are the request parameters.  
 
Request Header  Type  Mandatory  
authToken  String  yes 
 
Field  Type  Mandatory  Description  
customerId  String  yes Customer identifier  
countryCode  String  yes Country code  
otpLength  Integer  no Send a number between 4 and 8. Default is 
4 
mobileNumber  String  yes Mobile number  
flowType  String  yes We send OTP using multiple mediums  like 
SMS , email , etc. 
for now , use SMS only  
email  String  no Email is used when we send OTP through 
mail  
langId  String  no For sending SMS in different languages.  
By default language is English.  
For now,  we support English -only  
  
 
  6 | P a g e  
 
Request URL Path:  
 
Response JSON:  
A successful response will return a 200 status code . 
  /verification /v2/verif ication/send  
           
{ 
  "responseCode": Integer,  
  "message": "String",  
  "data": {  
    "verificationId": "String",  
    "mobileNumber": "String",  
    "responseCode": "String",  
    "errorMessage": "String",  
    "timeout": "String",  
    "smsCLI": "String",  
    "transactionId": "S tring"  
  } 
}  
 
  7 | P a g e  
 
Below in an example success send otp:  
curl --location --request POST 
'https://cpaas.messagecentral.com/verification/v2/verification/send?countryCode=91&customerId=C -
X6CXXB61FB71XXX&flowType=SMS&mobileNumber=98XXXX08XX&otpLength=4' \ 
--header  'authTo ken: 
eyJhbGciOiJIUzUxMiJ9.eyJzdL IiOiJDLTMzNDMyQTVGNDlGNzQwNCIsImlhdCI6MTY5NjMxNDQzNiwiZXhwI
joxNjk2OTE5MjM2fQ.UDSi6Mpjr5INVGm4SRFrPAFpxEanH64AD6JkiAv2zIReANR6pgmGEoo -
T4AXXmgpqXjP56NYh6mFvLQzI__uaA'  
 
 
  { 
  "responseCode": 200,  
  "message": "SUCCESS",  
  "data": {  
    "verificationId": "20",  
    "mobileNumber": " 8846735392",  
    "responseCode": "200",  
    "errorMessage": null,  
    "timeout": "60",  
    "smsCLI": null,  
    "transactionId": null  
  } 
}  
 
  8 | P a g e  
 
Validate O TP 
To validate below are fields.  
 
Request Header  Type  Mandatory  
authToken  String  yes 
 
Field  Type  Mandatory  Description  
customerId  String  Yes Customer identifier  
code  String  Yes Otp  
verificationId  Long  Yes VerificationId from response of sendOtp 
api 
langId  String  no For multiple language support  
by default is English.  
For now we support English only  
 
Request URL Path:  
 
Response JSON:  
A successful response will return a 200 status code . 
 
  /verification/v2 /verification/validateOtp  
 
{ 
  "responseCode": Integer,  
  "message": "string",  
  "data": {  
    "verificationId": Long,  
    "mobileNumber": "String",  
    "verificationStatus": "String",  
    "responseCode": "String",  
    "errorMessage": "String",  
    "transactionId": "String",  
    "authToken": "String"  
  } 
}  
 
  9 | P a g e  
 
Below is an example of successful validation  
curl --location 
'https://cpaas.messagecentral.com/verification/v2/verification/validateOtp?countryCode=91&mobileN
umber=98XX XX08XX&verificationId=20&customerId=C -X6CXXB61FB71XXX&code=8289' \ 
--header 'authToken: 
eyJhbGciOiJIUzUxMiJ9.eyJzdLIiOiJDLTMzNDMyQTVGNDlGNzQwNCIsImlhdCI6MTY5NjMxNDQzNiwiZXhwI
joxNjk2OTE5MjM2fQ.UDSi6Mpjr5INVGm4SRFrPAFpxEanH64AD6JkiAv2zIReANR6pgmGEoo -
T4AXXmgp qXjP56NYh6mFvLQzI__uaA'  
 
 
  { 
  "responseCode": 200,  
  "message": "SUCCESS",  
  "data": {  
    "verificationId": 20,  
    "mobileNumber": " 8846735392",  
    "verificationStatus": "VERIFICATION_COMPLETED",  
    "responseCode": "200",  
    "errorMessage": null,  
    "transactionId": null,  
    "authToken":   eyJhbGciOiJIUzUxMiJ9.eyJzdLIiOiJDLTMzNDMyQTVGNDlGNzQwNCIsImlhdCI6  
MTY5NjMxNDQzNiwiZXhwIjoxNjk2OTE5MjM2fQ.UDSi6Mpjr5INVGm4SRFrPAFpxEan
H64AD6JkiAv2zIReANR6pgmGEoo -T4AXXmgpqXjP56NYh6mFvLQzI__uaA  
  } 
}  
 
  10 | P a g e  
 
STATUS CODES  
 
Code  Display Text  
200 Success (Request Received / VERIFICATION_COMPLETED)  
400 Bad Request  
404 Resource Not Found  
409 Duplicate Resource  
500 Unknown Response. Please Try again later.  
501 INVALID_CUSTOMER_ID  
503 INVALID_ISOCOUNTRYCODE  
504 INVALID_MOBILE_NUMBERFORMAT  
505 INVALID_VERIFICATION_ID  
506 REQUEST_ALREADY_EXISTS  
507 NO_ACTIVE_DID_FOUND  
508 ALL_CREDITS_EXHAUSTED  
509 WRONG_CALL_FLOW_INIT_STATE_USED  
700 VERIFICATION_FAILED  
701 TRYING_FALLBACK  
702 WRONG_OTP_PROVIDED  
703 ALREADY_VERIFIED  
704 NOT_VALID_TYPE_REQUEST  
705 TRYING_FALLBACK_SMS_DELIVERED  
706 TRYING_FALLBACK_SMS_NOT_DELIVERED  
707 SMS_DELIVERED_SUCCESSFULLY  
708 SMS_DELIVERY_REPORT_PENDING  
709 WRONG_DID_PROVIDED  
711 COUNTRY_NOT_SUPPORTED_OTP_SENT  
730 SERVICE_NOT_ACTIVE  
 
 
 "responseMessage": "String" 
} 
 
Example success send otp : 
 
curl --location 
'https://cpaas.messagecentral.com/verification/v2/verification/send' \ 
--header 'authToken: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzUxMiJ9.eyJzdWIiOiJDLOTQ2RSIsMSwiZXhwIjoxNjkyMTgwNDAxfQ.I -
MsGOVDnRApFYNeLm4yErKxcW_PqMPweMH9a0y62xqO_b3cvZ96hLXp7UbQ' \ 
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \ 
--data -raw '{"customerId":"C-X6CXXB61FB71XXX","countryCode":"91","otpLength":"4","mobileNumber":"987654
3210","flowType":"SMS","email":"demo@messagecental.com","langId":""}' \ 
--header 'accept: */ *' 
 
{ 
  "responseCode": 200,  
  "responseMessage": "Succes s" 
} 
 
  7 | P a g e  
 
Validate OTP  
To validate OTP  below are the request parameters.  
 
Request Header  Type  Mandatory  
authToken  String  yes 
 
Field  Type  Mandatory  Description  
customerId  String  yes Customer identifier  
countryCode  String  yes Country code  
otp  String  yes OTP  
mobileNumber  String  yes Mobile number  
 
Request URL Path:  
  /verification /v2/verif ication/validate  
           
Response JSON:  
A successful response will return a 200 status code . 
 
 
{ 
  "responseCode": Integer,  
  "responseMessage": "String" 
} 
 
Example success validate otp : 
 
curl --location 
'https://cpaas.messagecentral.com/verification/v2/verification/validate' \ 
--header 'authToken: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzUxMiJ9.eyJzdWIiOiJDLOTQ2RSIsMSwiZXhwIjoxNjkyMTgwNDAxfQ.I -
MsGOVDnRApFYNeLm4yErKxcW_PqMPweMH9a0y62xqO_b3cvZ96hLXp7UbQ' \ 
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \ 
--data -raw '{"customerId":"C-X6CXXB61FB71XXX","countryCode":"91","otp":"1234","mobileNumber":"987654
3210"}' \ 
--header 'accept: */ *' 
 
{ 
  "responseCode": 200,  
  "responseMessage": "Succes s" 
}  
 
 
 
 
 
 
  8 | P a g e  
 
 
 
 
 
  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The status codes provided in the documentation are used to indicate the outcome or result of API requests. Some of the notable status codes are:

200: Success (Request Received / VERIFICATION_COMPLETED)
400: Bad Request
404: Resource Not Found
409: Duplicate Resource
500: Unknown Response. Please Try again later.
501: INVALID_CUSTOMER_ID
503: INVALID_ISOCOUNTRYCODE
504: INVALID_MOBILE_NUMBERFORMAT
505: INVALID_VERIFICATION_ID
506: REQUEST_ALREADY_EXISTS
507: NO_ACTIVE_DID_FOUND
508: ALL_CREDITS_EXHAUSTED
509: WRONG_CALL_FLOW_INIT_STATE_USED
700: VERIFICATION_FAILED
701: TRYING_FALLBACK
702: WRONG_OTP_PROVIDED
703: ALREADY_VERIFIED
704: NOT_VALID_TYPE_REQUEST
705: TRYING_FALLBACK_SMS_DELIVERED
706: TRYING_FALLBACK_SMS_NOT_DELIVERED
707: SMS_DELIVERED_SUCCESSFULLY
708: SMS_DELIVERY_REPORT_PENDING
709: WRONG_DID_PROVIDED
711: COUNTRY_NOT_SUPPORTED_OTP_SENT
730: SERVICE_NOT_ACTIVE

These status codes can be used to understand the result of API requests and take appropriate actions based on the response.
Feedback: remember the SEND SMS API and VALIDATE SMS API'S from this file
Introduction to Verify Now API docs

Mobile phone numbers serve as the ultimate user identity in the digital universe. Digital applications,whether on the web or on mobile verify the mobile numbers of their users to ensure their authenticity. To address this growing need, U2opia has developed a reliable, quick, and cost-effective mobile number verification service called Verify Now
For implementation support and any feedback, please reach out to us at 'operations@messagecentral.com'

The API will only accept requests from the service provider via the API Endpoint URI shared with the service provider and from whitelisted IP addresses over HTTP, partner to provide a list of source IP.REST API Base URL’s:All Platform API endpoints below should be prefixed with the following URL: 'https://cpaas.messagecentral.com'

To generate Auth Token for send otp & validate otp header. For now, the Auth Token automatically expires in 30 minutes.Field Type Mandatory Description customerId String yes Customer identifier country Integer no Country Email String no Email key String yes Base-64 encrypted password scope String no Use ‘NEW
/auth/v1/authentication/token A successful response will return a 200 status code.  {'status': Integer,'token': 'String'}

Request URL Path: Response JSON:A successful response will return a 200 status code./verification/v2/verification/send{'responseCode': Integer,'message': 'String','data': {'verificationId': 'String','mobileNumber': 'String''responseCode':'String','errorMessage': 'String','timeout': 'String','smsCLI': 'String','transactionId': 'String'}}

To validate below are fields. authToken String mandatory Field Type Mandatory Description customerId String Yes Customer identifiercode String Yes Otp verificationId Long Yes VerificationId from response of sendOtp api langId String no For multiple language support by default is English.For now we support English only Request URL Path: /verification/v2/verification/validateOtp Response JSON:A successful response will return a 200 status code./verification/v2/verification/validateOtp{'responseCode': Integer,'message': 'string','data': {'verificationId': Long,'mobileNumber': 'String','verificationStatus': 'String','responseCode': 'String','errorMessage': 'String','transactionId': 'String','authToken': 'String'}}

200 Success (Request Received / VERIFICATION_COMPLETED)400 Bad Request 404 Resource Not Found 409 Duplicate Resource 500 Unknown Response. Please Try again later. 501 INVALID_CUSTOMER_ID 503 INVALID_ISOCOUNTRYCODE 504 INVALID_MOBILE_NUMBERFORMAT 505 INVALID_VERIFICATION_ID 506 REQUEST_ALREADY_EXISTS 507 NO_ACTIVE_DID_FOUND 508 ALL_CREDITS_EXHAUSTED 509 WRONG_CALL_FLOW_INIT_STATE_USED 700 VERIFICATION_FAILED 701 TRYING_FALLBACK 702 WRONG_OTP_PROVIDED 703 ALREADY_VERIFIED 704 NOT_VALID_TYPE_REQUEST 705 TRYING_FALLBACK_SMS_DELIVERED 706 TRYING_FALLBACK_SMS_NOT_DELIVERED 707  SMS_DELIVERED_SUCCESSFULLY 708 SMS_DELIVERY_REPORT_PENDING 709 WRONG_DID_PROVIDED 711 COUNTRY_NOT_SUPPORTED_OTP_SENT 730 SERVICE_NOT_ACTIVE

Ruby: 

require "uri" 

require "net/http" 

 

url = URI("https://cpaas.messagecentral.com/auth/v1/authentication/token?country=IN&customerId=C- X6CXXB61FB71XXX&email=demo@messagecental.com&key=<BASE64_Encoded_Password>&scope=NEW") 

 

https = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port) 

https.use_ssl = true 

 

request = Net::HTTP::Get.new(url) 

request["accept"] = "*/*" 

 

response = https.request(request) 

puts response.read_body

Ruby: 
 
require "uri" 

require "net/http" 

 

url = URI("https://cpaas.messagecentral.com/verification/v2/verification/send?countryCode=91&customerId=C-C0157BFAF1B94F0&flowType=SMS&mobileNumber=9990655875") 

 

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port); 

request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(url) 

 

request["authToken"] = "eyJhbGciOiJIUzUxMiJ9.eyJzdLIiOiJDLTMzNDMyQTVGNDlGNzQwNCIsImlhdCI6MTY5NjMxNDQzNiwiZXhwIjoxNjk2OTE5MjM2fQ.UDSi6Mpjr5INVGm4SRFrPAFpxEanH64AD6JkiAv2zIReANR6pgmGEoo-T4AXXmgpqXjP56NYh6mFvLQzI__uaA" 

 

response = http.request(request) 

puts response.read_body

Ruby: 

require "uri" 

require "net/http" 

 

url = URI("https://cpaas.messagecentral.com/verification/v2/verification/validateOtp?countryCode=91&mobileNumber=9990655875&verificationId=XX&customerId=C-C0157BFAF1B94F0&code=XXXX") 

http = Net::HTTP.new(url.host, url.port); 

request = Net::HTTP::Get.new(url) 

request["authToken"] = "eyJhbGciOiJIUzUxMiJ9.eyJzdLIiOiJDLTMzNDMyQTVGNDlGNzQwNCIsImlhdCI6 

MTY5NjMxNDQzNiwiZXhwIjoxNjk2OTE5MjM2fQ.UDSi6Mpjr5INVGm4SRFrPAFpxEanH64AD6JkiAv2zIReANR6pgmGEoo-T4AXXmgpqXjP56NYh6mFvLQzI__uaA" 

response = http.request(request) 

puts response.read_body
